com.flipkart.lois.channel.api
Interface ReceiveChannel<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
Channel<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedChannel, SimpleChannel
public interface ReceiveChannel<T>

A simple "go" like channel abstraction for java over which messages can only be received

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close channel so that no new messages can be sent over this channel.
 boolean isOpen()
          Returns true if channel is open and false if channel is closed.
 boolean isReceivable()
          Returns true if a message can be received on the channel
 T receive()
          Receive a message of Type T if message is available or block the thread and put it in wait state until there is a message available.
 T receive(long timeOut, TimeUnit timeUnit)
          Receive a message of Type T if message is available or block the thread and put it in wait state until there is a message available or timeout TimeUnit's have passed.
 T tryReceive()
          Tries to receive a messag in a non blocking way.
 

Method Detail

receive

T receive()
          throws ChannelClosedException,
                 InterruptedException
Receive a message of Type T if message is available or block the thread and put it in wait state until there is a message available. If the channel has been closed and there are no more messages to be delivered, throw a ChannelClosedException

Returns:
a message of Type T
Throws:
ChannelClosedException
InterruptedException

receive

T receive(long timeOut,
          TimeUnit timeUnit)
          throws ChannelClosedException,
                 InterruptedException,
                 TimeoutException
Receive a message of Type T if message is available or block the thread and put it in wait state until there is a message available or timeout TimeUnit's have passed. If the channel has been closed and there are no more messages to be delivered, throw a ChannelClosedException. If the timeout has been breached a TimeoutException is thrown.

Parameters:
timeOut -
timeUnit -
Returns:
a message of Type T
Throws:
ChannelClosedException
InterruptedException
TimeoutException

tryReceive

T tryReceive()
             throws ChannelClosedException
Tries to receive a messag in a non blocking way. If a message isn't available to receive "null" is returned else the value that is recieved is returned. If there was no message to recieve and the channel is closed then a ChannelClosedException is thrown

Returns:
message of type T if available else returns null
Throws:
ChannelClosedException

close

void close()
Close channel so that no new messages can be sent over this channel. The messages that are already available on the channel can be consumed.

isOpen

boolean isOpen()
Returns true if channel is open and false if channel is closed.

Returns:
true if channel is open, false if channel is closed

isReceivable

boolean isReceivable()
                     throws ChannelClosedException
Returns true if a message can be received on the channel

Returns:
true if a message can be received on the channel
Throws:
ChannelClosedException
